task_text: [Epidemiology][Summarization] Summarize the CDC Pandemic Flu documentâ€™s strategy for maintaining non-pharmaceutical interventions alongside vaccination.

gold_end_state.answer: The CDC guidance recommends maintaining layered non-pharmaceutical interventions (masking, distancing, hand hygiene, targeted closures) while rolling out vaccines, adjusting interventions as coverage and epidemiological indicators evolve to avoid premature relaxation.
